result.arabic_text: وَلَا تَحۡزَنۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا تَكُن فِي ضَيۡقٖ مِّمَّا يَمۡكُرُونَ
result.translation: 70.Kaadu Nabiyow ama koros derre kot cabtaah koo dirabbossaamih sabbatah keenih marookitinaay, usun koh kah malsan uma malah sabbatah alil kak ceyta num makkin, diggah Yalli koo qoklelek (catelek).
